keyword: calories in thai pad see ew
title: Calories in Thai Pad See Ew
meta_description: Discover calories in Thai Pad See Ew per serving, including carbs, protein, fat, and full nutrition breakdown with tweaks and FAQs for better meal planning.
h1: Calories in Thai Pad See Ew
assumptions: Standard restaurant serving (~400 g) with flat rice noodles, pork, egg, Chinese broccoli, soy sauce; stir-fried with minimal oil.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by restaurant, portion size, meat type, oil used, and added ingredients. Check menus or apps for specifics.

quick_answer.text: One serving of Thai Pad See Ew has about 850 kcal, with high carbs from noodles and moderate protein from pork and egg.

label_note: Values align with Nutrition Facts labels for straightforward comparison to packaged or restaurant data.

tweaks.label: Add extra egg and chicken (vs. pork only)

faqs.q: How many calories in one serving of Thai Pad See Ew?
faqs.a: Approximately 850 kcal for a standard pork version.

faqs.q: What's the carb count in Thai Pad See Ew?
faqs.a: About 110 g carbs per serving, mostly from rice noodles.

faqs.q: Is Thai Pad See Ew high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 1800 mg per serving due to soy sauce.

faqs.q: How to make Thai Pad See Ew lower in calories?
faqs.a: Use less oil, more veggies, tofu instead of meat, or smaller noodle portion.

faqs.q: Protein in Thai Pad See Ew?
faqs.a: Roughly 32 g per serving from pork, egg, and minimal other sources.
